Entera Skincare, Sapphire Lux Firming Serum

Brand: Entera Skincare

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Copper Tripeptide-1, Glycerin, Propanediol, Arginine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ananas Sativus Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya Fruit Extract, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Pullulan, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, P

utamate Diacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
